name: Lost in Translation (and space)
description:
Your Universal Translator is busted! And the only mechanic in space doesn't speak english! Can you manage to communicate with them before the thing goes haywire?

(my first game jam game! i hope it doesn't suck too much lmao)

space sound2 by IFartInUrGeneralDirection (creative commons licence), Lose sound by cabled_mess (creative commons license)
